General.Name: Aplex Technology
General.Description: Aplex Technology Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells industrial PC products worldwide. The company provides stainless steel panel, industrial panel, embedded box, in-vehicle panel, and ATEx panel PC products. It also offers human-machine interfaces, ATEx displays, ATEx box PC products, industrial displays and boards, and machine vision systems, as well as accessories, including storage products, power adapters and modules, converter boards, and product stands. The company provides its products for use in smart factory, surveillance, control and communication, machine vision, food and beverage automation, kiosk and ticketing, ATEX oil and gas, smart warehousing and transportation, and healthcare applications. In addition, it offers OEM/ODM solutions, such as marking and coding machines, KVM displayers for military training, and indoor/outdoor security gate HMI solutions. Further, the company provides IOT solutions comprising intelligence HVAC, bridge safety monitoring system, traffic light IoT gateway, elevator remote monitoring, city common sewer monitoring, facial recognition gate, intelligent vending machine, power distribution room monitoring, oil exploration remote monitoring, cold storage monitoring, car media and monitor, and in-vehicle terminal control system solutions. Aplex Technology Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 186, Jian Yi Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
